questions.question: What does CSS stand for?
Which CSS property is used to change the text color of an element?
How can you include external CSS in an HTML document?
Which CSS selector selects all elements with the class 'example'?
What is the CSS property used to control the space between the inside border and the outside padding of an element?
Which CSS property is used to make text bold?
In CSS, what property is used to control the stacking order of elements?
Which CSS value is used to make an element transparent?
What is the CSS property used to create rounded corners on an element?
Which CSS display property value makes an element take up the entire width of its container?
What does the 'CSS' box model consist of?
Which CSS property is used to control the alignment of text within its container?
How do you apply a CSS style to a specific HTML element with the ID 'my-element'?
Which property is used to change the style of the cursor on hover?
What does 'CSS specificity' refer to?
options: The order in which styles are applied
The importance of a style rule
The weight of a style rule
How specific a style rule is in relation to a selector
questions.correctAnswer: How specific a style rule is in relation to a selector

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to create a horizontal line between content?
What is the CSS property used to control the spacing between lines of text?
How can you make a CSS class selector more specific than an element selector?
options: Increase the number of class selectors
Nest the class selector within the element selector
Add an ID to the class selector
questions.correctAnswer: Nest the class selector within the element selector

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to control the visibility of an element?
What is the purpose of the 'box-sizing' property in CSS?
options: To control the size of the box
To set the box model to 'border-box'
questions.correctAnswer: To set the box model to 'border-box'
